featured.text: Which job has the best benefits in addition to the regular salary? 3.
He sets aside a part of his salary for a scholarship fund for children from needy families.
After spending most of her salary on rent and food, Amelia _____ had any money left for entertainment and other expenses.

definition.zh_def: 工資；薪水，通常指員工因工作而獲得的報酬。
definition.en_def: A fixed regular payment, typically paid on a monthly or biweekly basis, made by an employer to an employee.
definition.example: She received her salary at the end of each month.
